alert.note: Alert for Knox (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Knox County through 545 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wausa, or 16 miles west of Hartington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wausa around 535 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
